item.title: Pamela Anderson on missing out on Oscars, ditching makeup and 'innocence' of Baywatch
item.description: The actress's career has enjoyed a recent resurgence thanks to a role in the film The Last Showgirl.

item.title: Gene Hackman and his wife Betsy Arakawa found dead at their home
item.description: Authorities say there was no sign the couple had sustained any injuries, but no cause of death has been given.

item.title: Tate brothers arrive in US after Romania prosecutors lift travel ban
item.description: The pair, facing trial for human trafficking, had been banned from leaving Romania in recent years.

item.title: Israel's military publishes first report on 7 October 2023 failures
item.description: The report says the military "failed in its mission to protect Israeli civilians" during Hamas's attack.

item.title: Thailand deports dozens of Uyghurs to China
item.description: The move comes after rights groups warned the Uyghurs face torture and possibly death back in China.
